GClasses::GMinkowskiDistance

GClasses::GMinkowskiDistance Class Reference

Interpolates between manhattan distance (norm=1), Euclidean distance (norm=2), and Chebyshev distance (norm=infinity). Throws an exception if any of the attributes are nominal. More...

Protected Attributes

double m_norm

Detailed Description

Interpolates between manhattan distance (norm=1), Euclidean distance (norm=2), and Chebyshev distance (norm=infinity). Throws an exception if any of the attributes are nominal.
